00103 void InternetSocket::fillAddress( const std::string& address, unsigned short port, sockaddr_in& addr)
00104 {
00105     addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00106     addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00107 
00108     // Assume we have a simple ipv4 address
00109     if( inet_aton( address.c_str(), &addr.sin_addr)) return;
00110 
00111     // We need to resolve the address
00112     hostent* host = gethostbyname( address.c_str());

00114     {
00115         // strerror() will not work for gethostbyname()

00117     }
